images.alt: Dental Implants Treatment at Zayra Dental Leeds

implantTypes.description: Replace one missing tooth with a natural-looking implant and crown
Replace several missing teeth with strategically placed implants
Complete smile reconstruction with implant-supported dentures

treatmentSteps.title: Comprehensive Assessment
treatmentSteps.description: 3D imaging and evaluation to create your personalized treatment plan

treatmentSteps.title: Implant Placement
treatmentSteps.description: Precise surgical placement of titanium implant into jawbone

treatmentSteps.title: Healing & Integration
treatmentSteps.description: Osseointegration period where implant bonds with natural bone

treatmentSteps.title: Crown Attachment
treatmentSteps.description: Custom crown designed and attached for perfect fit and appearance

benefits: Permanent solution that lasts 20+ years with proper care
Natural look and feel - indistinguishable from real teeth
Preserves jawbone health and facial structure
No impact on adjacent healthy teeth
Improved chewing function and speech clarity
Boost confidence with a complete, beautiful smile
candidateRequirements: Sufficient bone density in the jaw
